Method Detail

act

public void act()
Description copied from class: Physics
On every game tick, the Physics will change the Y velocity by the value of gravity (same as how gravity works in the real world). After it changes your y velocity to be more down, it checks your trajectory to see if you're going to collide with anything. If you are going to collide with anything, the checkTrajectory() method will set your X and Y velocities accordingly so you don't go through said objects. Then it will change the object's location by adding the X/Y velocity to the object's X/Y position.

Overrides:
act in class Physics

getWidth

public int getWidth()
Description copied from class: Positional
Returns the width of the object. It's the same as obj.getImage().getWidth(), but is a method of obj itself, instead of it's image.

Overrides:
